name: Property Tycoon Manager
description:
Welcome to Property Tycoon Manager, a game where you earn money by following interactive links on the screen, and by building your property empire. 

The goal of the game is to become as rich as you can, and buy every property, under the pressure of the bank's strict loan payback regime...

This game was created in twine, I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I did making it!

What's new since first release:

          Cosmetic adjustments

          Added 2 new properties

          Added a special shop for new gameplay

Bug fixes are constant - let me know if you find any!!

Play audio file alongside game if you want :P
